constraints.name: alternating_serving
constraints.description: 服务方在每轮后交替，且每名玩家连续服务的次数固定（Alice 1 次，Bob 2 次）
constraints.formal: serving_sequence = [A, B, B, A, A, B, B, ...]

constraints.name: score_increasing
constraints.description: 每一轮后，当前服务方的分数增加 1，另一方分数不变
constraints.formal: if X is serving, then (X', Y) = (X + 1, Y)

constraints.name: max_score_limit
constraints.description: 任意一方的分数不超过 11，且当一方达到 11 分时游戏结束
constraints.formal: 0 <= X, Y <= 11 and if X == 11 or Y == 11, game ends

constraints.name: valid_log_sequence
constraints.description: 日志中的每一项必须是有效的得分记录，且按时间顺序排列
constraints.formal: log[i] = (X_i, Y_i) and log[i-1] -> log[i] must be valid transition
